item.title: Rob add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "When love exists, nothing else matters, not lifeâ€™s predicaments, not the fury of the years, not a physical winding down or scarcity of opportunity." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "It is neither fair nor unfair, Nobody Owens. It simply is" -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You're always you, and that don't change, and you're always changing, and there's nothing you can do about it." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "It's like the people who believe they'll be happy if they go and live somewhere else, but who learn it doesn't work that way. Wherever you go, you take yourself with you. If you see what I mean." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You're alive, Bod. That means you have infinite potential. You can do anything, make anything, dream anything. If you can change the world, the world will change. Potential. Once you're dead, it's gone. Over. You've made what you've made, dreamed your dream, written your name. You may be buried here, you may even walk. But that potential is finished." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Really, he thought, if you couldn't trust a poet to offer sensible advice, who could you trust?" -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "If you dare nothing, then when the day is over, nothing is all you will have gained." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "People want to forget the impossible. It makes their world safer." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Face your life, its pain, its pleasure, leave no path untaken." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rob add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Bod said, 'I want to see life. I want to hold it in my hands. I want to leave a footprint on the sand of a desert island. I want to play football with people. I want,' he said, and then he paused and he thought. 'I want everything." -- Neil Gaiman
